La-La Land Records presents the original motion picture score to the all-new feature film Civil War drama FIELD OF LOST SHOES, starring Tom Skerrit, Lauren Holly, Jason Isaac and Keith David and directed by Sean McNamara. Acclaimed composer Frederik Wiedmann (SON OF BATMAN, GREEN LANTERN THE ANIMATED SERIES, MIRRORS 2) fashions a soulful, thoughtful score that swells with heroism, heartbreak and melancholy Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a perfect complement to this riveting true-story Civil War drama, which culminates with 1864Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Battle of New Market. Produced by Wiedmann and mastered by Noah Scot Snyder, this special release features classically rustic art design by Dan Goldwasser and is limited to 1000 units
